statements: SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE order_id = 101;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 100;
SELECT sale_date, product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE forecast_demand >= 50 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT order_id, product_name FROM sales_data WHERE production_schedule IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_sales > 5000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC
SELECT order_id, product_name, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE forecast_demand > 50 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-03-31' AND forecast_demand < 20 ORDER BY sale_date ASC
SELECT order_id, product_name, production_schedule FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 500 ORDER BY order_id ASC
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT product_name, production_date, production_quantity FROM production_schedule WHERE production_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT sale_amount, product_name FROM sales_data WHERE product_name='Product A' AND sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT AVG(sale_amount) AS average_sale_amount, product_name FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 ORDER BY average_sale_amount DESC;
SELECT production_date, production_quantity FROM production_schedule WHERE product_name='Product B' ORDER BY production_date ASC;
SELECT s.product_name, p.production_quantity FROM sales_data s JOIN production_schedule p ON s.product_name = p.product_name WHERE s.sale_amount > 5000 ORDER BY p.production_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT sales_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM production_schedule WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, price FROM product ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT production_date, production_quantity FROM production_schedule WHERE product_id = 3 AND production_quantity >= 1000 ORDER BY production_date ASC;
SELECT sales_id, product_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY sale_amount ASC, sale_date DESC;

SELECT product.product_name, production_schedule.production_date, production_schedule.production_quantity FROM product INNER JOIN production_schedule ON product.product_id = production_schedule.product_id WHERE production_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sales_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM sales_data WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity_sold FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name
SELECT product_id, production_date FROM production_schedule WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY production_date
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE stock_quantity < 100
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY quantity DESC, price ASC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity * price) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name HAVING SUM(quantity * price) > 1000;
SELECT sales_date, product_name, quantity, price FROM sales_data INNER JOIN production_schedule ON sales_data.product_name = production_schedule.product_id;
SELECT forecast_date, product_id, forecast_quantity FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecast_quantity > (SELECT AVG(forecast_quantity) FROM demand_forecast);
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM sales_data INNER JOIN inventory ON sales_data.id = inventory.product_id;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_data;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM product_data ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT sale_id, customer_id, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_id, MAX(production_quantity) AS max_production FROM production_schedule GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT product_name, product_category, unit_price FROM product_data ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT s.sale_id, s.customer_id, c.customer_name, s.sale_date FROM sales_data s JOIN customer_data c ON s.customer_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT p.product_name, ps.schedule_date, ps.production_quantity FROM product_data p INNER JOIN production_schedule ps ON p.product_id = ps.product_id WHERE production_quantity > 1000;
